objectives.en: Introduction to Digital Image Processing course is organised to introduce the fundamentals of digital signal and image processing techniques.  The emphasis will be on analysis tools, the understanding of digital images, the acquisition of digital images, and on early stage use of digital image processing in natural science and engineering. The course will emphasis in image representation, image manipulation, image filtering and enhancement, and recognition of images.

learning_outcomes.en:
Understand the meaning of signals and image
Understand image formation 
Understanding of digitalisation of analogue image
Learn the image processing algorithms for enhancement of an image
Acquire an appreciation for the image processing issues and techniques and be able to apply these techniques to real world problems in natural science
Be able to conduct independent study and analysis of image processing problems and techniques
